text: William Henry Avery (August 11, 1911 â€“ November 4, 2009) was an American Republican Party politician who was the 37th Governor of Kansas from 1965 until 1967. He also representaed Kansas in the United States House of Representatives from 1955 until 1965. Avery died on November 4, 2009 in Wakefield, Kansas at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:2009 deaths Category:United States representatives from Kansas Category:Governors of Kansas Category:Kansas Republicans Category:Businesspeople from Kansas Category:American bankers
